Reviews.Title: Nice System
Reviews.Author: Scott M. Sargent "Scott"
Reviews.Content: This security system (being the only one I own), seems to provide all I need for a home security system.  The cameras are not the best, but for the price they are ok.  A bit grainy but ok.  My biggest complaint is the lack of documentation.  After mutteling around on the internet and youtube, I was able to find what I need.  The cables that come with the system are nice and work well, however I find that drilling a 3/4" hole to get the BNC Cable through can be troublesome. So, I purchased a CAT 5 cable and the necessary ends watched youtube videos and saw how to make my own cable.  This way, I only have to fish a small line through the wall and it does not have to be a hole 3/4" wide.

Reviews.Title: It's ok!
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: It's analog technology, but works fine. The DVR save digital. Just need more room in the hard drive. Installation is easy to setup and Internet access is fair enought.

ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 8 Channels Real Time 240FPS Recording and Display, 500GB Hard disk Built in
4 x Sharp CCD Day Night IR Bullet Color Cameras up to 65FT and 4 x Sharp CCD Day Night IR Indoor Dome Color Cameras up to 65FT
Network Remote Viewing on Windows IE, Apple Mac FireFox, iPhone , Windows Mobile
8 x 65ft video cable with power wire, one Power distributor Box
One Year Warranty. Full Technical Supports
